title: 97/227/EC: Commission Decision of 3 March 1997 amending Decision 95/473/EC establishing the list of approved fish farms in France (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 3 March 1997 amending Decision 95/473/EC establishing the list of approved fish farms in France (Text with EEA relevance) (97/227/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Annex to Decision 95/473/EC is hereby replaced by the Annex hereto.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:

For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
